recipesJson.name: KOPear
recipesJson.author: domyam
recipesJson.description: Pear Juice that good it will put you straight into a K.O. Seriously, some nice pear and strawberry rounded out with a lemon meringue.

reviews.text: At first i was turned off because of the cactus, but after about 10 days it tuned down and now it adds a really nice touch that fits the rest of this interesting mix very well. Can recommend!
